Posts.Content: Feb 2, 2015 01:43PM Jknee54 wrote: I was just dx with stage 1 idc and am facing 5 weeks of radiation treatment. I am concerned with being able to work (I'm a 2nd grade teacher) while receiving rads. Wish there were more posts here for input.
Posts.Title: radiation and fibromyalgia susiered Jknee54
